[ C ] a part of a planet's environment where life exists: How do biospheres construct themselves ? With a massive impact, a biosphere gets another chance. the biosphere
[ S ] the part of the earth's environment where life exists: We can survive as a species only if we live by the rules of the biosphere. The species and behavioural diversity of the biosphere were devastated during such events. See also
